fire-punch.description: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.

ice-punch.description: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.

thunder-punch.description: Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target.

cut.description: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

fly.description: User flies high into the air, dodging all attacks, and hits next turn.

headbutt.description: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.

roar.description: Immediately ends wild battles.  Forces trainers to switch Pokémon.

surf.description: Inflicts regular damage and can hit Dive users.

blizzard.description: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.

hyper-beam.description: User foregoes its next turn to recharge.

strength.description: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

solar-beam.description: Requires a turn to charge before attacking.

thunder.description: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.

earthquake.description: Inflicts regular damage and can hit Dig users.

dig.description: User digs underground, dodging all attacks, and hits next turn.

toxic.description: Badly poisons the target, inflicting more damage every turn.

psychic.description: Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Special Defense by one stage.

double-team.description: Raises the user’s evasion by one stage.

defense-curl.description: Raises user’s Defense by one stage.

fire-blast.description: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.

waterfall.description: Has a 20% chance to make the target flinch.

dream-eater.description: Only works on sleeping Pokémon.  Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.

flash.description: Lowers the target’s accuracy by one stage.

rest.description: User sleeps for two turns, completely healing itself.

nightmare.description: Target loses 1/4 its max HP every turn as long as it’s asleep.

snore.description: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.  Only works if the user is sleeping.

curse.description: Ghosts pay half their max HP to hurt the target every turn.  Others decrease Speed but raise Attack and Defense.

protect.description: Prevents any moves from hitting the user this turn.

sludge-bomb.description: Has a 30% chance to poison the target.

mud-slap.description: Has a 100% chance to lower the target’s accuracy by one stage.

zap-cannon.description: Has a 100% chance to paralyze the target.

icy-wind.description: Has a 100% chance to lower the target’s Speed by one stage.

detect.description: Prevents any moves from hitting the user this turn.

sandstorm.description: Changes the weather to a sandstorm for five turns.

giga-drain.description: Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.

endure.description: Prevents the user’s HP from lowering below 1 this turn.

rollout.description: Power doubles every turn this move is used in succession after the first, resetting after five turns.

swagger.description: Raises the target’s Attack by two stages and confuses the target.

fury-cutter.description: Power doubles every turn this move is used in succession after the first, maxing out after five turns.

steel-wing.description: Has a 10% chance to raise the user’s Defense by one stage.

attract.description: Target falls in love if it has the opposite gender, and has a 50% chance to refuse attacking the user.

sleep-talk.description: Randomly uses one of the user’s other three moves.  Only works if the user is sleeping.

return.description: Power increases with happiness, up to a maximum of 102.

frustration.description: Power increases as happiness decreases, up to a maximum of 102.

dynamic-punch.description: Has a 100% chance to confuse the target.

dragon-breath.description: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.

sweet-scent.description: Lowers the target’s evasion by one stage.

iron-tail.description: Has a 30% chance to lower the target’s Defense by one stage.

hidden-power.description: Power and type depend upon user’s IVs.  Power can range from 30 to 70.

rain-dance.description: Changes the weather to rain for five turns.

sunny-day.description: Changes the weather to sunny for five turns.

psych-up.description: Discards the user’s stat changes and copies the target’s.

shadow-ball.description: Has a 20% chance to lower the target’s Special Defense by one stage.

rock-smash.description: Has a 50% chance to lower the target’s Defense by one stage.

whirlpool.description: Prevents the target from leaving battle and inflicts 1/16 its max HP in damage for 2-5 turns.
